alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG WIND WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 145 PM EST... At 1258 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong wind gusts along a line extending from near Wintersville to near Caldwell. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Cranberry, Moon Township, Weirton, Steubenville, East Liverpool, Aliquippa, Moundsville, Beaver Falls, Martins Ferry, Monaca, and New Martinsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 198 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 7. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 19 and 26. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 22. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 84 and 86. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 31 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble
